import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserLogged } from '../Store/UserContextStore' import Helmet from 'react-helmet' export default function Home() { let navigate = useNavigate() let user = useContext(UserLogged) function NavigateFilter(e,value){ e.preventDefault() navigate(`/home/Tags/${value}`,{Filter:value}) } return ( <> Home {user.error?
{user.error} {close()}}>
:''}

Welcome {user.name?user.name:''}

Related Tags :

{NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>Shooter {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>Action {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>RPG {NavigateFilter(e,e.target.textContent)}}>Puzzle {navigate('/home')}}>Remove Tags
) }
